example[0]: the anonymous author of a collection of poems
example[1]: According to one employee, who wishes to remain anonymous, the company engaged in illegal activities.
example[2]: the anonymous donor of a large sum of money
definition[1]: done, sent, or given by someone who does not want their name to be known
note[1]: anonymous phone call/letter etc (=one that is often unpleasant or contains threats)
